extendedInfo.description: Have you heard about the latest craze to hit Android?! Thousands of players and treasure locations worldwide!!Dig A What is a location-based treasure hunt which combines  aspects of geocaching and metal detecting. Search for 'virtual' treasure by following the directions displayed on screen. 'Dig' up treasure at the click of a button (no spade required!)Each piece of treasure found will provide you with a new puzzle piece. Only when the puzzle is complete will you be able to crack the final puzzle code!Players can also 'bury' treasure by clicking on a map, and can send the details to their friends so that they can try to locate this treasure. Friends working together could be the true key to success in this game.Notes: - Dig A What requires internet access to communicate with a server for many aspects of the game play.- Dig A What requires access to GPS location information for your mobile device.- The game is completely free to use, funded only by in-game adverts. If you would be willing to pay for a version without adverts (and how much), please let us know by sending a mail to support@digawhat.com.If you experience any problems when playing this game, or if you have any suggestions on how to make the game better, please send an email to support@digawhat.com instead of posting negative feedback. We are unable to contact you if you post feedback on Google Play.

reviews.title: Good idea....
reviews.comment: Well I like the idea but it always says it can\'t find my location even when my GPS is on and there are no treasures near me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Concept is great but when I set a treasure the locator would make the application to on the Fritz as I approached it. Many more comments. PM me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It force closes on my mort backflip :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Why do I need to register??? And after I get all of my info in it force closes when I continue. Can\'t even get to the game. UNINSTALL!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great little game - bury some stuff, send the locations to your friends, get them to bury things too and see who can solve the puzzle first!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantastic idea! Great fun to play with friends.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FFS
reviews.comment: Can\'t find GPS Location. Can\'t find any treasures. Map section wander all over the place. Server says it can\'t be reached.
reviews.author: Mark Steele
